com.google.example.games.basegameutils

Class BaseGameActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • FragmentActivity
      • com.google.example.games.basegameutils.BaseGameActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameHelper.GameHelperListener

    public abstract class BaseGameActivity
extends FragmentActivity
implements GameHelper.GameHelperListener
    Example base class for games. This implementation takes care of setting up the API client object and managing its lifecycle. Subclasses only need to override the @link{#onSignInSucceeded} and @link{#onSignInFailed} abstract methods. To initiate the sign-in flow when the user clicks the sign-in button, subclasses should call @link{#beginUserInitiatedSignIn}. By default, this class only instantiates the GoogleApiClient object. If the PlusClient or AppStateClient objects are also wanted, call the BaseGameActivity(int) constructor and specify the requested clients. For example, to request PlusClient and GamesClient, use BaseGameActivity(CLIENT_GAMES | CLIENT_PLUS). To request all available clients, use BaseGameActivity(CLIENT_ALL). Alternatively, you can also specify the requested clients via
    Author:
    Bruno Oliveira (Google)

      • BaseGameActivity

        protected BaseGameActivity(int requestedClients)
        Constructs a BaseGameActivity with the requested clients.
        Parameters:
        requestedClients - The requested clients (a combination of CLIENT_GAMES, CLIENT_PLUS and CLIENT_APPSTATE).

    • Method Detail

      • setRequestedClients

        protected void setRequestedClients(int requestedClients)
        Sets the requested clients. The preferred way to set the requested clients is via the constructor, but this method is available if for some reason your code cannot do this in the constructor. This must be called before onCreate or getGameHelper() in order to have any effect. If called after onCreate()/getGameHelper(), this method is a no-op.
        Parameters:
        requestedClients - A combination of the flags CLIENT_GAMES, CLIENT_PLUS and CLIENT_APPSTATE, or CLIENT_ALL to request all available clients.
